entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
